thread.title: Wife who is allergic to husband faints in new house
thread.title_full: Wife who is allergic to husband faints in new house

title: Wife who is allergic to husband faints in new house
text: show ad Wife, 29, who is allergic to everything, including her own HUSBAND, faints upon entering $125,000 'safe' house he spent a year renovating just for her Johanna Watkins, 29, has been living in a sealed bedroom for the past year because she suffers from mast cell activation syndrome (MCAS) She is allergic to her husband, Scott, who built her a safe space for her condition He built a pressurized house with heated furniture to help keep allergens out Watkins fainted upon entering the new house because of the new paint smell Scott said his wife is weak, but is slowly gaining a tolerance to the new place Published: 22:16 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 22:55 GMT, 15 February 2017 24 shares
